game.name: DRAGON QUEST® XI S: Echoes of an Elusive Age™
game.shortDescription:
![Dragon Quest XI S Image](https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/egs-dragonquestxisechoesofanelusiveage-squareenix-g2-00-770x500-960515403.jpg)

# STORY

A young man travels to a sacred stone in order to participate in his village’s coming of age ceremony. After a series of unexpected events, he learns that he is the reincarnation of a legendary hero from a forgotten age.

Our hero sets forth into an unknown world on a journey to unravel the mystery of his past... but the welcome he receives is far from warm. Upon revealing his identity to the King, he is branded as “The Darkspawn” and hunted relentlessly throughout the land.

**This complete edition includes an array of new content, features and improvements.** 
● Enjoy new character-specific scenarios.
● Switch freely between 3D HD and 2D 16-bit modes, the original and orchestral soundtracks, and English and Japanese audio. 
● Visit the 16-bit town of Tickington, a gateway to the worlds of past DRAGON QUEST titles.
● Speed up battle by x2 or x4, and charge into the fray on new mountable monsters.
● Spice up your adventure with new Draconian Quest settings.
● Immortalise your party in Photo Mode.

# KEY FEATURES

**Enjoy an Epic Mystery and a Riveting Tale**
● Be prepared for an immersive story with twists and turns that pull you in and keep you craving more.

![Dragon Quest XI S Image](https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/egs-dragonquestxisechoesofanelusiveage-squareenix-g2-01-770x500-960515444.jpg)

**Explore a Massive, Beautiful, Living World**
● Excitement lurks around every corner! Observe NPCs attending to their daily schedules, monsters changing behaviors to fit their environments, and access new areas by foot, on horseback or with the use of monstrous mounts.

![Dragon Quest XI S Image](https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/egs-dragonquestxisechoesofanelusiveage-squareenix-g2-02-770x500-960515507.jpg)

**Have Some Fun & Save the World**
● Tons of side-quests and addictive mini-games await you, with enough content to keep you playing for well over 100 hours.

**Challenge Yourself with Draconian Quest**
● Available when you start a new game, the options on offer allow you to create your own customized difficulty level, with each different setting providing an additional challenge.
